Title: Episode #1.1
Writer: Joe Penhall (created by), John Douglas (based upon the book by), Mark Olshaker (based upon the book by), Joe Penhall
Actors: Jonathan Groff, Lee R. Sellars, David H. Holmes, Joanna Lowe
Plot: In 1977, frustrated FBI hostage negotiator Holden Ford finds an unlikely ally in veteran agent Bill Tench and begins studying a new class of murderer.
